rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.
rev.diff:
Line 18: Line 18:
'''Vodafone Egypt''' is [[Egypt]]'s largest [[mobile network operator]]. It was launched in 1998 and was formerly known as '''Click GSM'''. Vodafone Egypt has currently suspended operations in "certain areas" in compliance with government orders enacted as a result of the [[2011 Egyptian protests]]. Vodafone Egypt was also criticized for sending pro-government advertisement as text messages. Vodafone claimed that it was required to do so by local law.
'''Vodafone Egypt''' is [[Egypt]]'s largest [[mobile network operator]]. It was launched in 1998 and was formerly known as '''Click GSM'''. Vodafone Egypt has currently suspended operations in "certain areas" in compliance with government orders enacted as a result of the [[2011 Egyptian protests]]. Vodafone Egypt was also criticized for sending pro-government advertisement as text messages. Vodafone claimed that it was required to do so by local law.

==About Vodafone Egypt==
==About Vodafone Egypt==
Vodafone Egypt is a total telecommunications provider, covering a wide array of voice and data exchange services, as well as 3G, ADSL and broadband Internet services. Launched in 1998, Vodafone Egypt, supported by Vodafone Groupâs know-how and its own local market research, provides innovative products and services.
